profileAlternative.name: Gaurav Soin
profileAlternative.headline: MongoDB India - Database Service on Cloud
profileAlternative.summary:
I don't believe in third person introductions, so here's mine in my own words.

I have always believed in working on things that have the potential to create a positive impact.

My primary strengths are into setting up good teams, managing products from scratch, growth & digital marketing. I have an avid interest in creating new business focuses by innovating on existing models and products.

A Marketing, Sales and Operations professional with 6 plus years of work experience with Interest including:

►Consulting and Advisory services for small & medium Technology & Digital Companies
►Outsourced Business Development and Marketing
►Demand Generation & Marketing Automation
►Marketing Consulting and Advisory Services
►Digital Marketing & Online Campaigns
►Inside Sales Team Building, Mentoring & Coaching
►Strategic Partnerships & Global Alliances
►Offshore Project Management

positions.title: Corporate Account Executive at MongoDB
positions.description:
I help companies drive innovation and scale faster by making data easy to work with. Enabling organizations to unleash the power of Digital Transformation through a variety of strategic initiatives like:

- Legacy Modernisation
- New IT models like Agile, DevOps, Microservices
- Movement to cloud to accelerate time to market
- Adopt new use-cases like IoT, Blockchain, AI/ML, etc to enhance existing capabilities

MongoDB is the leading modern, general purpose database platform, designed to unleash the power of software and data for developers and the applications they build
…
see more

positions.title: Sr Business Development Manager
positions.description:
Brand MOBILOITTE can be summed up as a fun and life loving bunch of people who take their work responsibly and rejoice the client's success. In this world of small and big talk, we strive at all times to be counted and remembered as reliable partners for our clients.

We have proven expertise and exposure working with various business verticals & domains, some of them are listed below:

-Education: Schools, Colleges, Universities
-Healthcare
-Hospitality: Restaurants, Hotels
-Fitness: Gyms, Spas
-Geo Fencing: Taxi, Cab Service Management
-Field Force Management
-Campaign Management including Political
-Event Management: Live Streaming
-Media: Print, Digital

Our core expertise is focused around FOUR key areas and related service offerings:
1. Native Mobile Application Development
2. Cross Platform Mobile Application Development
3. Web Application Technologies
4. Web, CMS and Cloud based services and solutions

**Working for last 6+ Years

## 400+ Mobile Apps & 150+ Web Projects delivered successfully till date.
## 5800+ Hours of work with 300+ Milestones delivered.
## A Preferred Choice & Reliable Partner for companies looking to offshore Development work.

An awesome track record!**A big thanks to everyone.
…
see more

educations.title: Kirloskar Institute Of Advanced Managment Studies

given.text:
“"Gaurav is an exemplary manager and mentor who thrives at sharing insights and spreading knowledge. He cares not only for the bottom line, but for the growth and development of the team. He is that rare combination of balanced right brain/left brain...able to communicate very effectively with analytical types, expressive creative types and to motivate his team to perform. His years of experience has made him highly skillful at aligning a company's interests with those of the individuals with whom he works. Gaurav encourages team work, keeps processes simple and powerful, and his brainstorming sessions are really fun!"”
…
See more

received.text: I worked with Zain for more than a year and I must say he has good communication and project handling skills, he drives the projects smoothly from the beginning till closure and works in an efficient manner to deliver the projects.
I was managing Pramita in Mobiloitte during her early days in Mobiloitte Technologies. She is hardworking and dedicated professional. I wish her success in upcoming years of professional career.
